headline: Market Meltdown: 1 Screaming Buy Down 50% Hasn't Been This Cheap in 5 Years
summary: Then, the markets got a boost after the election, as many thought the new U.S. presidential administration would be stock market-friendly.  Although it fell short of estimates, the quarter wasn't catastrophic, and neither was 2024 as a whole.

headline: Nasdaq Bear Market: 2 Brilliant Stocks Down 53% and 67% to Buy Before They Double, According to Wall Street
summary: The Nasdaq Composite (NASDAQINDEX: ^IXIC) recently entered a bear market, which means the technology-focused index has tumbled more than 20% from its record high.  Arm stock has fallen 53% from its high, partially because investors were disappointed with the guidance management provided in the latest quarter.  The Trade Desk stock has fallen 67% from its high, partially because the company reported disappointing financial results in the latest quarter.
